title: What is the interpretation of seeing boiled eggs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing boiled eggs in a dream: Seeing eggs is considered one of the visions around which there is a lot of controversy between hatred and desire, and this is due to some cases that we will examine in detail, and this vision has many associations that vary depending on considerations, such as where eggs can be boiled or fried, It can be spoiled or raw, and the yolk or white of eggs can be eaten. What concerns us in this article is the distinction between seeing boiled eggs in a dream with all its situations and connotations. What is the interpretation of seeing boiled eggs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Boiled eggs in a dream Eggs in a dream represent growth, renewal, and birth. Fertility, thinking, renewal, growth, great improvement at all levels, patience, management, and careful thinking in the depth of events. This vision also indicates sustenance, kindness, women and marriage, the change of seasons and seasons, the succession of events and circumstances, and receiving important and serious news in its impact. As for the interpretation of a dream about boiled eggs, It is evidence of correcting mistakes, removing sins and despair from the heart, renewing life, making major changes in the personality, and thinking about tomorrow. Whoever sees a lot of boiled eggs, this represents accumulating or collecting money, gaining a new source of livelihood, harvesting ripe fruits, and participating in... Long-term projects and projects. If one sees that he is eating boiled eggs, this symbolizes earning money after a period of constant work and effort, livelihood after toil and hardship, and long patience and perseverance. White indicates gathering around an event, starting a big project, implementing a plan and an idea that comes to mind. Mindfulness, coming together after estrangement and rivalry, and ending the constant conflict between people. Boiled eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing eggs means blessing, goodness, abundant livelihood, God’s blessings upon His servants, reaping profits and benefits, changing circumstances, ending distress and anguish, and the death of sadness. This vision is also an indication of women, marriage and sexual intercourse, and eggs symbolize a beautiful woman. Because of the words of God Almighty: “As if they were hidden eggs.” This vision also expresses good morals, immunity from doubt and temptation, divine providence, good qualities, maturity of thought and ambition, and distance from immorality and sins. And if one sees boiled eggs, this is an indication of changing the path Wrong or reversing a corrupt decision that results in many unwanted results and stopping doing something that is useless. This vision also indicates the pitfalls and obstacles that a person overcomes, the purification of sins and misdeeds, the revival of hope and clinging to it, the reversal of grave error and the ability to do things that... Worthless, things that have value. And honor. If the fortuneteller sees that he is eating boiled eggs, this symbolizes comfort after hardship, ease after hardship, and the ability to reach the desired goal after many ambiguities and difficult problems, solve complex problems, and achieve victory and the desired goal. The vision may indicate pregnancy and childbirth.

title: Accurate interpretation of wheat in a dream

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of wheat in a dream “Joseph, the truthful, give us your fatwa concerning cows, seven cows, seven ears ... This vision expresses the abundance of sustenance and abundant lawful money that her husband will soon obtain. If a married woman sees a grain of wheat. This vision expresses her imminent pregnancy. A married woman who sees black wheat in her dream is a warning to her that she must take care of her children and her home. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is carrying a bundle of wheat, or a bag, and that the bag is intact and without defect. This vision expresses the stability of her affairs, the affairs of her children, and whether the grains of this bag are spoiled. This vision reflects wrong upbringing and excessive grooming. Interpretation of boiling wheat in a dream If a person sees in a dream that he is boiling wheat. This vision expresses his help to his family. Until things improve. Seeing his mother boiling wheat in a dream expresses the mother's support for her children in crises and difficult situations. Wheat in a dream If a person sees in a dream that he is passing through a wheat field. This expresses what is close to this person of happiness, pleasure and comfort. Seeing wheat in a dream means an abundance of goodness and the upcoming food that the dreamer will obtain. Interpretation of seeing wheat bags in a dream Seeing a bag of wheat in a dream means a lot of money stored in the house or in the bank for commercial and investment purposes. Seeing green wheat in a dream If a person sees in a dream, the wheat is green in color. This vision expresses that he will be able to achieve all the dreams and aspirations he desires. Seeing ears of corn in a dream If a person sees ears of wheat in a dream. This vision is one of the praiseworthy visions. Where the ears symbolize the years and seeing a person in a dream and the green ear in the dream expresses a year full of goodness, livelihood and happiness. Harvesting wheat in a dream Seeing a wheat harvest in a dream means an abundance of goodness and livelihood coming to the face of the dreamer. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is collecting wheat, she collects it in bags. This dream expresses excellence and success in the future. And investment.Seeing green wheat in a dreamIf one sees in a dream, wheat is green in color. This vision expresses that he will be able to achieve all the dreams and aspirations he desires. Seeing ears of corn in a dreamIf a person sees ears of wheat in a dream. This vision is a laudable one. title: Interpretation of wearing a ring in a dream, seeing a ring in a dream

preview.html: The concept of a ring, a ring, a wedding ring and an engagement ring for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman. The ring in a dream is one of the strangest dreams that we can see in our dreams and it causes us a lot and a lot of confusion in knowing the interpretation of the dream, as the ring carries many meanings and associations that come to the dreamer . Which must be completely stopped and known, and people wear rings in life in order to have complete adornment on the hands, especially women who have the best silver and gold rings. The great translator Ibn Sirin tells us in his interpretations that the ring in a dream has many meanings and signs that may come to the pregnant woman, which must be known. And get its interpretation through complete knowledge of the dream. Interpretation of the ring in a dream Holding a ring for single girls or finding or buying it in a dream is a sign of marriage. As for married people, the vision shows that God is blessing them with a child. If you see in a dream that you are giving a ring to a woman, the vision shows her marriage and she will give birth to a child. A male ring in a dream indicates the sealing, completion, completion, and ownership of things, whether it is an engagement, marriage, a child, work, or owning something that is your intention, and the finer the ring, the better and stronger the interpretation. And vice versa. An engagement ring in a dream. An engagement ring in a dream is good news for single and single women, and obtaining it by purchasing or finding it is a sign of marriage. A ring in a dream is beneficial for single girls, but it is less in interpretation than a ring and indicates unresolved marriage issues. Seeing is considered The double seal for single people is a sign of the beginning of a stage in which stability prevails on the emotional level. As for a married man, his vision indicates twins, and in some cases polygamy for men. Seeing a ring on your thumb in a dream indicates the decisive decisions you will make, for which you must bear responsibility. Seeing a ring on your finger in a dream indicates your desire to control and lead and that your ambitions are much greater than what you have achieved. This indicates wearing a ring. On the middle finger in a dream to the completion of something you have been waiting for a long time. The dream also indicates the search for solutions, even intermediate solutions. Seeing a ring on the finger, especially on the left hand, is a sign of marriage, but on the right it indicates an event, perhaps a new job, new friendships and an indication of optimism, hope and hope for goodness in the future. It indicates... Seeing a ring on the pinky finger indicates a desire to expand your external relationships, whether at work or in friendships, and indicates that things are improving. Seeing a ring on the toe can be interpreted more closely to the interpretation of wearing a ring on the toe, the difference is that wearing a ring on the toe The foot indicates that the dreamer has the initiative to solve it and take the necessary measures to complete it. Dreaming of a ring in a dream indicates a husband, and if you do not like the ring, this indicates that you do not have a suitable husband yet. Interpretation of wearing a ring in a dream. Seeing a ring in a dream is evidence of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for single, pregnant, and married women according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Many girls search for an interpretation of a dream about buying clothes. Women in general are tired of buying new clothes and feel happy and joyful, but if they see this in a dream, how do legal experts interpret it? All dreams and visions can be interpreted in two different meanings, the meaning of praise and the meaning of non-praise, and this is due to Knowing a set of details and symbols in the dream, in addition to the difference in interpretation. According to the dreamer, his gender, and his marital status, whether male or female, married, divorced, single, and more. For example, we find that the interpretation of a dream differs between a married woman, an unmarried girl, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a widow, etc. What is the interpretation of a dream about buying clothes according to Ibn Sirin? The scholar and jurist Ibn Sirin put forward a different set of interpretations in interpreting a dream about buying clothes. Clothes are different. These interpretations are found in the following points: Ibn Sirin says that buying clothes in a dream generally indicates concealment, piety, dealing with morals, and purity with others. But if the dreamer sees in a dream clothes in his home, this is evidence of thrift and saving to deal with upcoming financial hardships. In a secret and correct way. If the dreamer in a dream is choosing and buying clothes, then this here indicates a strong insight into what is around him and his ability to set priorities and make the right choices. This vision according to Ibn Sirin indicates the great benefit that accrues to the dreamer by achieving the goal and satisfying the dreamer’s desires. Ibn Sirin states that seeing buying clothes in a dream is evidence of skill and workmanship and that the fortuneteller is skilled in his work and defends the oppressed. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a trip in a dream for a single woman. Buying clothes in an unmarried girl’s dream. It should be noted that the interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for a single woman differs greatly. From the rest of the interpretations, the dream of a single woman has implications for her future, such as: If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream buying clothes, this may be evidence of her satisfaction with her situation and reality, as well as her possession of good morals. Seeing a girl in a dream shopping for clothes could That it is a sign of purity and concealment, and that she is as careful in choosing her companions as she is in buying her clothes. But if a girl in a dream buys certain clothes for a relationship or a group, this is evidence that she will belong to a certain group or join a job in a certain uniform, etc. In the event that For an unmarried girl to buy tight clothes in a dream, this is evidence that she will make a wrong choice and will be exposed to gossip that may concern her and her family’s reputation. If the clothes that the girl buys reveal themselves, then she will expose herself to revealing her secrets and getting into a lot of trouble. Buying clothes in a woman’s dream Married Woman: Regarding the interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for a married woman, many scholars and translators have developed a number of interpretations, the most important of which are: Buying clothes in a married woman’s dream indicates the goodness and happiness that she will gain in the coming period. When a married woman sees herself in a dream,

title: Interpretation of money in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of gold coins differs from silver, metal, and others, and in this article from the gptafser.com website, we will show you the interpretations related to seeing money. Interpretation of a dream about money in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees a lot of money in a dream. This indicates that she is a diligent and excellent student and strives to achieve all her dreams. When the girl sees that she is counting the money, she was confused and anxious. This showed that she was asked to choose something, and she was even confused about choosing what is right for her. Paper money in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates the date of her engagement to someone she loves and is satisfied with. Seeing coins in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates problems and pressures in her life. Seeing money and valuable real estate in the dreamer's dream indicates that she will receive a lot of money and perhaps wealth from one of her relatives. Seeing a single girl with a shiny wallet with a lot of money indicates the fulfillment of her dreams or her success in the final exams. Donating money from one person to a known person shows the girl's love for that person. Seeing giving money to a stranger whom the unmarried girl does not actually know indicates problems in Life and God knows best. That girl is proud of her money and wealth in reality.Money on the way indicates a new relationship or a new friend that the dreamer will get to know soon.If a married woman sees engravings on the money, this indicates the happiness that the fortuneteller enjoys, and the wealth and goodness that will come to her.Seeing silver coins in a married man's dream indicates the dreamer's daughters, or seeing gold coins indicates that woman's children.Seeing a married woman counting money in her dream means that the dreamer will secure her future and her children from poverty.Interpretation of a dream about money in a man's dream and its meaningSeeing a man carrying a lot of money in his hands is a sign of the good and abundant livelihood that he will obtain.It may indicate a new job or position that he will obtain as a result of his diligence in his previous job.He declares money from his relative or friends, he writes In his name. Seeing colored money in a man's dream means lying and deception. He may refer to perjury or forging documents in his work. Seeing money paid by a man in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions, and perhaps this dream shows a warning about something. Whether you see a man receiving money, this is a sign of the dreamer's needs meeting the requirements of his home and an indication that his circumstances will be alleviated. Seeing a man losing money on something unknown indicates the dissolution of family ties and problems between him and his wife. It indicates that he commits an immorality, and that he is far from God Almighty, and he must

title: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a lover in a dream, seeing a lover is one of the visions that bring feelings of joy and happiness to the dreamer’s heart, especially if he misses him and thinks about him a lot. In this article, we will learn more about the most prominent interpretations of the vision. Seeing your loved one in a dream Seeing your loved one in a dream is one of the important visions that brings you joy and happiness and expresses the end of sadness and the beginning of a new life, especially if he smiles at you or carries a gift with him. Seeing your loved one holding your hand in... A dream is a dream that gives you peace, happiness, and psychological comfort. Imam Al-Sadiq sees that the lover in a dream is evidence of the good deeds that the dreamer does in life. If he sees him wearing clean white clothes, this is happy news of marriage. If the sick person sees in his dream a person dear to his heart and comforts him or carries He has a bouquet of roses, then this is a good vision and indicates recovery, but if a dead person takes you with him to a far away place. So it is a vision that refers to the near term. Seeing a lover in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that a lover in a dream for a man or woman is a symbol of achieving goals and achieving what the viewer aspires to, without making an effort and without feeling tired. If a man sees that he is talking to someone close to him, The conversation with him was friendly and he smiled. This dream is evidence of friendly and good relations between the dreamer and this person. The vision also indicates cooperation between you and obtaining material gains. While the dream of a lover who gives you new money indicates a high status and an increase in sustenance, but if he gives you In general, the interpretation of the vision here is to extend a helping hand to others and work to help them. Seeing a lover in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a lover in a dream for an unmarried woman is a vision that indicates a lot of thinking about the lover on a permanent basis and a desire to get close to him, especially in the case of the vision being repeated in dreams. Girl. If a Virgo sees that her lover is deceiving her in a dream, this means that he is in a relationship with another girl, and that he is not serious in dealing with her, so she should slow down and think carefully about her relationship with him. Seeing her beloved marrying a second girl, and there are signs of joy and music, is a bad vision. It indicates the troubles and sorrows that the girl will suffer in her future life. If an unmarried girl sees that she is meeting her lover at night away from people, this vision is a symbol of secrets and things that she wants to hide from people, and Ibn Shaheen said that she is very worried and afraid of this relationship. During the vision The lover with an angry and angry face is asleep, then this is a warning of her separation and distance from him, which causes her psychological pain, but if he is happy, then it is a metaphor for success and happiness. Seeing a lover in a dream for a married woman Seeing someone she loves in a dream for a married woman, if he is her current husband, is a good vision He shows a lot of kindness and success in life, and his appearance is a symbol of love, friendship, and the strength of the family bond between them. While the vision of the former lady shows that she is falling into major crises and problems with her current husband, as a result of the suffering she feels and the lack of understanding between them, which puts pressure on her.
preview.text: Seeing a lover in a dream, seeing a lover is one of the visions that bring feelings of joy and happiness to the dreamer’s heart, especially if he misses him and thinks about him a lot. In this article, we will learn more about the most prominent interpretations of the vision. Seeing your loved one in a dream Seeing your loved one in a dream is one of the important visions that brings you joy and happiness and expresses the end of sadness and the beginning of a new life, especially if he smiles at you or carries a gift with him. Seeing your loved one holding your hand in... A dream is a dream that gives you peace, happiness, and psychological comfort. Imam Al-Sadiq sees that the lover in a dream is evidence of the good deeds that the dreamer does in life. If he sees him wearing clean white clothes, this is happy news of marriage. If the sick person sees in his dream a person dear to his heart and comforts him or carries He has a bouquet of roses, then this is a good vision and indicates recovery, but if a dead person takes you with him to a far away place. So it is a vision that refers to the near term. Seeing a lover in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that a lover in a dream for a man or woman is a symbol of achieving goals and achieving what the viewer aspires to, without making an effort and without feeling tired. If a man sees that he is talking to someone close to him, The conversation with him was friendly and he smiled. This dream is evidence of friendly and good relations between the dreamer and this person. The vision also indicates cooperation between you and obtaining material gains. While the dream of a lover who gives you new money indicates a high status and an increase in sustenance, but if he gives you In general, the interpretation of the vision here is to extend a helping hand to others and work to help them. Seeing a lover in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a lover in a dream for an unmarried woman is a vision that indicates a lot of thinking about the lover on a permanent basis and a desire to get close to him, especially in the case of the vision being repeated in dreams. Girl. If a Virgo sees that her lover is deceiving her in a dream, this means that he is in a relationship with another girl, and that he is not serious in dealing with her, so she should slow down and think carefully about her relationship with him. Seeing her beloved marrying a second girl, and there are signs of joy and music, is a bad vision. It indicates the troubles and sorrows that the girl will suffer in her future life. If an unmarried girl sees that she is meeting her lover at night away from people, this vision is a symbol of secrets and things that she wants to hide from people, and Ibn Shaheen said that she is very worried and afraid of this relationship. During the vision The lover with an angry and angry face is asleep, then this is a warning of her separation and distance from him, which causes her psychological pain, but if he is happy, then it is a metaphor for success and happiness. Seeing a lover in a dream for a married woman Seeing someone she loves in a dream for a married woman, if he is her current husband, is a good vision He shows a lot of kindness and success in life, and his appearance is a symbol of love, friendship, and the strength of the family bond between them. While the vision of the former lady shows that she is falling into major crises and problems with her current husband, as a result of the suffering she feels and the lack of understanding between them, which puts pressure on her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection near Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream with signs of the Day of Resurrection, interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection near and the earth splitting open

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of ResurrectionThe Day of Resurrection is a frightening dream because it often contains frightening scenes that a person sees and wakes up frightened from his sleep in search of the true meaning behind this dream, and from here we searched for these meanings from the words of the great dream interpreters and whether they express good or evil. Interpretation of a dream Resurrection Day. What is the interpretation of a dream about Resurrection Day coming soon? Seeing the approaching Resurrection Day is one of the dreams that raises panic in hearts, especially if the dreamer sees signs of the great Resurrection, such as an eclipse of the Earth, the splitting of the Earth or the Moon, and other signs and signs. Horrors mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in threatening verses on the Day of Resurrection. The interpretation of a dream near the Day of Resurrection conveys good news that the future will be more special than the past. The dreamer achieves his goals and ambitions that he always thought were difficult to achieve. If one sees that there is an important sign of the Day of Resurrection, and he obediently seeks to escape its horrors and please God, then this dream is a sign of his righteousness and piety. Contemporary interpreters believe that dreaming of this difficult day is a sign of difficulties And the difficulties that a person will find in his life, which require great effort and exhaustion to escape. If the dreamer wants to enter into a new project or development in his life, such as marriage, then he must be careful in thinking and look at the matter from all sides and angles, so that he can make the appropriate decision without guilt. Future. A man’s vision is more than signs that express the approaching Day of Resurrection, and it is an indication for some interpreters of the many offers that come to him and the opportunities that are given to him, and he should not waste them and try to seize them. . Because it has a great impact on the course of his life in the future. But if the dreamer believes that what he sees is a sure sign of the Hour, but it turns out otherwise to him during his sleep, then in most cases he was on the verge of a major problem or a certain crisis that God Almighty saved him from. From. What is the interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection near Ibn Sirin? Imam Ibn Sirin said that whoever sees this dream is a person who has either disobeyed his Lord and committed many sins, and the time has come for repentance and returning to God Almighty, or he is righteous with strong faith and piety, and God wanted to multiply his obedience until He attained his destiny on the last day. Whoever is a believer and insists on performing the obligatory prayers and supplications, whether it is prayer, charity, or anything else, then his dream is a sign to him that his full reward will not be lost, and that God does not forget his loyal servants. As for seeing a foolish young man or woman He forgets the afterlife and only cares about his earthly life, so this dream is a sign and a stern warning that immortality is not for humans and that the time is near, so he must seize life for his own sake. You reach heaven and not the other way around. But if the signs become clear and horror is seen, then this is a bad sign of the spread of injustice and corruption on earth. The interpretation of the dream about the Day of Resurrection is close to single women. The girl feels very anxious if she sees such a dream. However, some interpreters indicated that there is a chance To go abroad can wait for her, as long as she is looking for it.But if

title: Interpretation of a dream about kissing the Prophet’s grave in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about kissing the grave of the Messenger in a dream If you are wondering what the interpretation of a dream about kissing the grave of the Messenger in a dream means and whether it is good or bad, we present to you below all this and more details about you.Interpretation of a dream about kissing the grave of the Messenger in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about kissing the grave of the Messenger in a dream. Seeing the grave of the Messenger expresses goodness and living, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees the grave of the Messenger in a dream, this may be a sign that he is walking in the path of the Messenger, and God knows the unseen. It may also express abandonment of disobedience and sins, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the grave of the Messenger, this may indicate On religiosity and following the Sunnah of the Prophet, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the Messenger speaking to me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the Messenger speaking to me in a dream could be a reference to goodness and care, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Where a vision of the Messenger speaking to you may express goodness and sustenance, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When he saw a single girl, the Messenger may have spoken to her. That would be evidence of goodness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams: The Messenger defending me in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of the Messenger defending me in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing the Messenger defending me. However, seeing me defending the Messenger may indicate his love, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees that he is defending The Messenger expresses his love for the Messenger, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a young man is seen defending the Messenger, this may be a sign of his love for the Prophet, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams of the Messenger giving something in a dreamThe interpretation of a dream in which the Messenger gives something in a dream could be a sign of things Good, as it may express receiving it from the Messenger in a dream, it may be an indication of blessing, and God knows the unseen. When you see the Messenger giving something that expresses intercession on the Day of Resurrection, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing legumes from the Messenger may indicate freedom from problems and worries, God willing. Interpretation of a dream that I am the Messenger of God in a dream. Interpretation Dreaming that I am a prophet in a dream could indicate sincerity and that God has knowledge of the unseen, as it expresses his honesty and good qualities, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees that he is a prophet, this may be evidence of his honesty and trust, and God Almighty is high. Likewise, if a young man sees that he is a prophet, This may be evidence of sincerity and trust, and God knows the unseen. The interpretation of the dream of the Messenger advised me in a dream. The interpretation of dreams of the Messenger advised me in a dream, and we did not find clear interpretations to see this. However, seeing the Messenger talking to you can lead to good things, God willing, as it can express goodness and living, and God knows best. The unseenWhen you see an unmarried girl, the Messenger talking to her may be an indication of the livelihood that she will obtain, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The interpretation of a dream about the Messenger calling me in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about the Messenger calling me in a dream may be an indication of following his Sunnah, and God knows the unseen. When I see the Prophet calling me in a dream, I may This would be an indication of religiosity, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees the Prophet praying, this may be evidence that she is following the path of the Messenger, and God is Most High and Most Knowing.

title: Interpretation of small leprosy in a dream: Gecko in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a gecko indicates a problem from someone and other interpretations that we will explain to a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, such as killing a gecko or seeing a gecko flying into the house, or a large black gecko by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq, and more interpretations about Continuation topic below. Seeing a gecko in a dream A gecko is a small gecko that belongs to reptiles, specifically the scalloped one. The colors of the gecko vary between red, brown, gray, and green. Seeing a gecko in a dream often indicates the presence of envy of the pioneer or his home, but the indicators of these The vision also varies according to the condition of the dreamer. We will explain seeing a gecko in a dream. Interpretation of a gecko in a dream. Seeing a gecko in a dream. Interpretation of Imam al-Sadiq. Killing a gecko can symbolize the end of arguments and freedom from fears. It can also indicate an evil person hiding in the dreamer or causing strife between him and his family or friends. Seeing a gecko in an unmarried woman’s dream can indicate the presence of someone who is always harassing her and causing her many problems in her life. Seeing a lot of geckos in a dream A single woman indicates a lot of gossip and hatred that surrounds her and it appears that she does not realize this matter because it comes from people close to her who do not expect this from them. Seeing a gecko changing its color in a single woman’s dream is evidence of the presence of people who color with the visionary female with the intention of exploiting her and causing harm. In it. – Seeing killing a gecko in a dream for a single woman also suggests getting rid of fears by getting rid of the gecko. Seeing a large group of geckos in the dreamer’s house is evidence of envy, so the house must be fortified by reading the Holy Qur’an. Seeing a gecko in a married woman’s dream indicates A large number of problems at home, and the accumulation of these problems on her and on her family members also appears. – Also, seeing a gecko in a dream for a married woman, according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation, indicates the presence of financial or marital problems, and seeing killing a gecko in a dream means getting rid of it. It will, God willing. - Running over a gecko in a dream for a married woman means getting rid of all problems, worries, and problems, whether financial or related to her work. Seeing a large or small gecko and killing it in a man’s dream is evidence that the worries and problems that bother him in his life will stop. As for seeing a gecko bite On a man’s leg in a dream, it indicates that he has committed a sin or a crime, and this vision is a warning to him of the necessity of returning to God and repenting and not repeating it. Wrong again. In general, seeing one or more geckos killed in a dream bodes well, because killing them is actually a good thing, as most of us know. Seeing a gecko in a pregnant woman’s dream can indicate many fears that she may face due to the approaching date of birth, The gecko's appearance is frightening. Seeing a gecko being killed in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence that she will pass the pregnancy easily and will not suffer any harm or severe pain. Seeing many geckos being killed in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence of...
